English.title: Road Bike Fit Recommendation Tool

inseam: Vertical distance from heel to pubic bone using a firm object against crotch
trunk: From pubic bone to sternal notch (between collarbones)
forearm: From elbow (olecranon) to center of hand or handlebar grip
arm: From acromion (shoulder tip) to center of hand or handlebar grip
thigh: From greater trochanter (hip side bone) to knee joint center
leg: From knee joint center to heel or medial malleolus
sacrum: From heel to suprasternal notch (top of sternum)
height: Upright standing height from ground to top of head
shoulder: Distance between left and right acromion (shoulder tips)
sitbone: Horizontal distance between sit bones, measured via pressure marks

English.stack_ok: âœ… Match. Use a {value} cm spacer
English.stack_fail: âŒ Too far off. Consider changing frame
English.reach_fit: âœ… Recommended {required} mm stem, difference from default {default} mm is {diff} mm â†’ Default stem is acceptable
English.reach_unfit: âŒ Needs {required} mm stem, default is {default} mm â†’ Consider a {direction} stem or changing frame size
English.shoulder_suggest: Recommended handlebar width: {value} cm Â±2 cm
